# Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel University of Agriculture and Technology

Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel University of Agriculture and Technology (SVPUAT) is an agricultural university at Meerut in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh. It was established in 2002 with a campus area of 562.5 Acres.
